channel.description: Recent content in GER:SZG on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: German Steelmaker Salzgitter Thrust Into Defense-Stock Spotlight
item.description: A German steelmaker became the latest stock to benefit from a surge in European defense spending this week after getting the go-ahead for one of its products to be used for military purposes.
